lo_instructions.macos:
LibreOffice is needed for PPT conversion.

Install it free from:
https://www.libreoffice.org/download

Or with Homebrew:
brew install --cask libreoffice
lo_instructions.windows:
LibreOffice is needed for PPT conversion.

Download the free installer from:
https://www.libreoffice.org/download

Run the installer and restart LocalPDF.
lo_instructions.linux:
LibreOffice is needed for PPT conversion.

Install via your package manager:
sudo apt install libreoffice

Or download from:
https://www.libreoffice.org/download
